summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Leaderlix email marketing automation system. Backend APIs are fully functional (95.7% success rate) and frontend UI flows work correctly with proper validation.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 400 when email already exists (expected behavior)

ui_warnings.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility
affected_selectors: Dialog modals in Templates and Campaigns

validation_working.validation: Properly requires at least one contact to be selected

passed_tests: Templates CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Events page - scraping functionality (9 events loaded)
Campaigns page - campaign creation with validation
